name: SpeechRecognition.abort
description: The abort() method of the Web Speech API stops the speech recognition service from listening to incoming audio, and doesn't attempt to return a SpeechRecognitionResult.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The abort() method of the Web Speech API stops the speech recognition service from listening to incoming audio, and doesn't attempt to return a SpeechRecognitionResult.
